name: Simple Folio
author: PressTigers

sections.description:
This plugin will help you to create and manage multiple portfolio for your website with different set of items and individual settings.

The portfolio is rendered on the front end using a simple shortcode [simple_folio id=”put portfolio id here”]

Demo Link

Plugin Features

  • Responsive
  • Easy to use and customize
  • Inside Grid Placement
  • Portfolio Filters
  • Automatic Shortcode Generator

Credits

  1. MixItUp (https://mixitup.kunkalabs.com)
sections.installation:
1. Download plugin.
  2. Upload simple-folio.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory to your web server.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Create a standard WordPress page or post and use [simple_folio id=”put portfolio id here”] shortcode in the editor.

Edit Item - User can edit item details.
Items - List of added items for admin site.
